author: abhijeet Kindo
title: Its a mastepiece
content: Its a perfect game and must play game for every gamer . Graphics are top notch,gameplay ,story ,dialouge ,character .after all best game of all time .

author: Anuj Pachhel
title: Masterpiece
content: Splendid. You feel like kratos after this. I am 50 hours into the game, story wise it has amazing content especially if you are into norse mythology, and core story is 25-30 hours. But the additional content is also worth it.Gonna try new game plus and Valhalla when I get the time!

author: Pratik Mandal
title: Worth it...
content: This is the best game I have ever played and you can't stop playing it, awesome graphics and story. You HAVE to play this game.

author: Anju Prova Dutta
title: Heard great things about this game and the first one was a masterpiece so I have no doubts
content: As for my product, I'm slightly disappointed as the data disc holder has come off due to slight damage in the game case as you can see. Other than that, I received a sealed copy of the game and don't have any complaints. But this is a fragile item that should've been handled with more care.

author: Ashvin
title: Average game
content: Not that entertaining. Its just a hype.
